EmailTemplate.name: 17.Security.Endpoint.Malware.N.M.E.13339.South Africa Security.Email 3 - NetGuar
EmailTemplate.subject: New solutions for new cyber security realities
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> White paper and case study Nokia NetGuard: Your best defence against cyberattacks and malware
Use security operations, analytics, and reporting (SOAR) to strengthen your cyber defence. With NetGuard Security Management Center, you can combine security insights with automation to respond to threats faster. Boost customer satisfaction and profits by protecting smartphone users from malware. NetGuard Endpoint Security lets you support value-added services that ensure a safe and secure mobile experience. With regards, Deon Geyser, Market Unit Head, Nokia South Africa Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
